description: “Man, it’s great to back! I wanted to wait till I was in peak shape so I could come here and show off. It took a little bit but this is gonna be a good time.” Clearly, Jack was ready to fuck and we figured Ollie would be the perfect bottom for this gentle giant. Jack and Ollie started out riding on the beach, which was fun and a little humbling for them. “This is a lot tougher than it looks! I'm a little embarrassed.” Jack admitted as Ollie zipped right past him. After breaking a sweat and getting to know each other, Ollie offered up his massage skills to settle Jack back into the scene. “Those muscles are impressive!” Ollie was clearly very pleased as he was rubbing his hands all over Jack's back. “Damn!” Jack may have been gone for a while but he definitely remembers how to fuck like a champ. He pounded out Ollie all over set and really pushed his limits. I think the best part about this was watching how impressed Jack was when he shot his load deep into Ollie and watched it drip out of his ass!
title: Jack & Ollie: Bareback
